data.title: TAWAS: Wave equation solver
data.name: TAWAS
data.description: TAWAS is an IDL script for solving the wave equation for torsional Alfvèn waves in a viscous plasma. The background magnetic field is axisymmetric and force-free with no azimuthal component and the plasma beta is assumed to be negligable. The solution is calculated using the analytical formula presented in https://academic.oup.com/mnras/article-abstract/510/2/1910/6449388?redirectedFrom=fulltext.

evidence: "TAWAS is an IDL script for solving the wave equation for Torsional Alfvèn Waves (TAWs) propagating in a viscous plasma."
"TAWAS can be run using IDL. The code requires no input files but the user is able to change the problem parameters at the top of the code"

"This paper makes extensive use of the TAWAS code for considering the role of wave reflection, running paprameters studies and for comparing the analytical solutions to exact solutions of the linearised governing equations"
